profile: Tom MacRae Painting has 25 years experience in all types of painting including commercial, new home construction but specialize in residential repaints. I use only top quality paint and will give you a firm quote and stick to my price unless more work is added. Your house will be completed on time and I will let you know exactly what areas will be completed each day so your home will stay intact as possible. References are available and include many public spaces you may be familiar with. I will beat any other quotes that you receive as well. We specialize in Residential repaints, commercial work and epoxy coatings. Drywall repairs and stipple conversion to flat ceilings. New home construction to revitalizing homes for resale, we do it all.

profile:
TRUSTED OTTAWA HOUSE PAINTERS - Women Owned and Operated.

***

Need your home, condo, cabinets or commercial property painted with speed and quality? Looking for a fast, full-service painting contractor that delivers the quality you expect in a timeline that's unexpected?

***

We're WOW 1 DAY PAINTING, and we're creating happy customers throughout the National Capital Region with our professional, all-inclusive interior and exterior painting services. Whether you need a single wall painted, your office re-decorated, or your whole home needs a makeover, we're here to help.

Our innovative painting system combines expert estimates, premium-quality materials, special systems, and teams of professional painters that match the size of your project to WOW our customers.
------------------

TRANSFORM YOUR HOME WITH OUR PROFESSIONAL PAINTERS

When you're looking for 1 day difference, professional painting services, you can count on our team of painters to provide you with beautiful results with minimal disruption to your busy schedule.

We start by providing you with a free, personalized quote prepared at your home by one of our friendly estimators. As a full-service painting contractor, our estimates include all the materials, high-quality paint, and labor needed to prepare and paint your walls.

If you decide to hire us, we'll arrive on your project day with a big crew of friendly, uniformed painters. We'll begin by covering your floors and furniture with our clean drop cloths and filling any small cracks and holes in your walls. If you have wallpaper or caulking that needs removing, we can take care of that too.

Our on-site supervisor continuously monitors the painting throughout the day to ensure your walls look perfect. Once we're finished painting, we'll tidy everything up, leaving you with nothing but a stunning fresh coat of paint to admire! Before we leave, we'll complete a walk through with you to double-check our work and make sure you are completely satisfied with our professional painting services.

We're so sure you'll love us, and our services, that we back our work with a written two-year warranty. You'll be amazed at what a difference a day makes!

----------------

WE DO EXTERIOR PAINTING

The long, cold winters and hot, humid summers here in Ottawa can really take a toll on exterior surfaces like siding, window frames, garage doors, and decks, leading to premature wear and expensive repair bills. Whether you'd like your window frames touched up, your garage door re-painted, or you'd like to give your entire home a makeover, we're here to help. Just imagine how your house will look with a nice fresh coat of paint!

Our team of skilled, uniformed painters have experience in painting all types of outside surfaces, including stucco, brick, concrete, wood, and more. We can re-paint your window frames, stain your solid wood deck, or give your entire home a complete makeover in no time. WOW!

Before we begin painting, we'll carefully clean the surfaces with our pressure washers to ensure the paint adheres well, scrap of loose paint and we'll protect your hedges, gardens, and vehicles while we work with drop cloths. We'll work quickly and efficiently, just like with our interior painting services, and once we're done, you'll be amazed at what a difference a day makes!

profile:
At Strokes of Genius Painting and Genius General Contracting, we pride ourselves on delivering quality, guaranteed workmanship at a reasonable price... AND on a reasonable timeframe! We strive to be the perfect one-stop-shop for any of your home improvement needs. Whether your project is as simple as painting a bathroom, or as complicated as a full kitchen renovation... or anything in between, give us a call to see why we are the best company in Ottawa to guide you through the process. We are a 100% local company, no franchise fees back to Toronto or elsewhere, just a tight-knit team of skilled local painters and trades excited to help you transform your home!

Our reviews speak for themselves-- over 7 years of overwhelmingly 10/10 reviews from happy clients who hired us for all kinds of painting and home improvement projects, and were extremely happy with the results. After you read through our testimonials here, check out our websites for many more photos of our work and lots more information about the Genius advantage: www.StrokesofGenius.ca for painting, and www.GeniusGC.ca for everything else!

Flying Colours Precision Painting is a local Ottawa company that specializes in Interior and Exterior Painting , Restaurant Painting , Showroom Painting , Wallpapering and Photo Walls and Commercial Painting.  We paint Decks , Fences and any exterior product such as benches , flowerboxes and even your mailbox.

     We work hand in hand with colour co-ordinators and interior decorators that can help you with choosing the colours that match both your furnishings and your style.

    We appreciate that a painting project is a major interuption to your life so we have developed the Customer Involvement Program to make the job run smoothly both for you and for us.
Communication is key with all of our clients so you will always be informed as to the progress of the job and deadlines on a daily basis.

     We are prompt and extremely curtious and you will find dealing with us a pleasure and a decision you will not regret.  We offer free estimates and seniors discounts.

profile:
Green Property Restorations Ottawa is an owner operated business staffed by IICRC professionals with over 16 years of combined experience in the restoration industry. Our specialist IICRC accredited training means we use only state-of-the-art diagnostic technology and techniques to deliver property recovery and restoration. 

We value each opportunity to grow our business and we take great pride in developing strong and ongoing relationships with our clients. Our portfolio of clients includes residential customers, Insurers, Loss Adjusters, Commercial Property Managers, Real Estate Agents, Owners Corporations as well as Builders and we are able to respond 24/7 to any storm, flood or fire damage you have experienced. If this is for your home, it means getting things back to normal as quickly as possible. If this is for your business, it goes right to your bottom line: keeping people employed and the business running.

​​With the reassurance of over 16 years of professional expertise, let Green Property Restorations Ottawa guide you through the process of restoration to your damaged property. With our certified partners and suppliers, we are focused on providing a reliable and professional service guaranteed to exceed your expectations.
name: Green Property Restorations

profile:
At Millers Painting We know just how important your home or commercial property is to you and we are dedicated to providing a high quality paint job that will look great for years to come.

From our extreme detail on preparation down to the final finishing coat. Millers Painting takes great pride in our work. Our team of professionals offer many years of experience so nothing goes unnoticed. We spend 90% of our time on preparation. Without the right prep the product could fail and the end result wont be as fabulous. From patching your walls, priming, caulking baseboards, window, and door trim. Pole sanding your wall before painting and in between coats, to provide the smoothest looks and finish. For exterior work we scrape off old paint and sand.  We also restore or replace any old rotten wood. Pressure wash to make sure all dirt and debris is removed for maximum adhesion of paint and stain.
* References Available 
* Fully Insured $2,000,000 Residential and commercial
* WSIB $1,000,000
* Free estimates
* 5 Year warranty on interior repaints
* All employees are certified with, Working at Heights, Fall Safety, WHMIS, Background checks

Areas Served
Ottawa, Kemptville, Kanata, Barrhaven, Nepean, Manotick, Stittsville, Carp, Westboro, Riverside, Orleans, Cumberland, Gloucester, Brockville, Prescott, Spencerville,

profile:
With House Painters in Ottawa You Get:
 
Affordable prices – we have some of the most competitive rates in Ottawa. When it comes to value for money, we can’t be beat.
 
Reliability – we complete the work within the estimated time, and there are no hidden costs. All of our painters are thoroughly vetted. You can feel that all of your possessions are safe at all times.
Quality And Satisfaction Guaranteed – our work is backed by our word and a satisfaction guarantee.
 
Ottawa Painting Services
We are dedicated to providing the highest level of service in and around Ottawa, including communities on both sides of the river. Being the capital of Canada, Ottawans are used to a certain level of service, and we have lived up to expectations time and again.
 
We offer commercial and residential painting services, including:
Interior and exterior painting/
exterior painting/
Epoxy floor painting/
Wall repair/
Home improvement services such as plastering and sheetrock installation/
Power washing/
And more
 
Call us or contact us on the web for your free quote. Fill out our form and we will be with you ASAP.
